```{r}
source("../../../src/results_functions_precis2.r")
source("../../../src/results_functions.r")

x_rater = "Human Rater 1"
y_rater = "Human Rater 2"

human = read.csv2("../../../data/PRECIS-2/human.csv", row.names = "trials.trials_id", na.strings = NULL)
human$author_year = paste0(human$trials.author, " (", human$trials.pub_year, ")")
human$title = human$trials.title
human$DOI = human$trials.doi

rater1 = read.csv2("human_raters.csv", na.strings = c("NA", "", "?"))
rater1 = rater1[seq(1, nrow(rater1), by=2),]
rownames(rater1) = rater1$pragmeta_trial_id
colnames(rater1)[c(6,8,10,12,14,16,18,20,22)] =  paste0(domains, "_", x_rater)

results = read.csv2("human_raters.csv", na.strings = c("NA", "", "?"))
results = results[seq(2, nrow(results), by=2),]
rownames(results) = results$pragmeta_trial_id
results$author_year = human[rownames(results), "author_year"]
results$title = human[rownames(results), "title"]
results$link = paste0("https://doi.org/", human[rownames(results), "DOI"])
colnames(results)[c(6,8,10,12,14,16,18,20,22)] =  paste0(domains, "_", y_rater)
results[is.na(results)] = "NA"

# Combine results
results[paste0(domains, "_", x_rater)] = rater1[rownames(results), paste0(domains, "_", x_rater)]

results = results[order(as.integer(rownames(results))),]
```
